max_select_qty.label: Max Quantity for Select Drop Down

additional_allow.label: Allowed Countries For Specific Customer Groups

customer_groups.label: Customer Groups
customer_groups.comment: The selected customer groups with allowed countries will override the original Magento allowed country settings from General > General > Countries Options

hide_strikethrough_price.label: Hide original/strike through prices
hide_strikethrough_price.comment: Select yes to Hide original/strike through price of product. No to show original/strike through price

b2cpur_orderlimit.label: B2C and PUR Minimum order Limit

links.label: Category Id and Static Blocks
links.comment: Rules to display shade guide: any products with the shade configurable attribute and belongs to the category id, then display the static blocks contents

fields.amount: translate="label"> Promo Amount The amount that will be displayed on cart promo will be (subtotal - promo amount). text 20 1 1 1

message.label: Promo Message
message.comment: %s will be replaced with (subtotal - promo amount). Ex: You are $%s away from a free lipstick!

eligible_message.label: Eligible Message
eligible_message.comment: Message to display after cart amount exceeds the promo amount.

product_sku.label: Related Product SKU
product_sku.comment: SKU of the product that will be displayed next to the static block banner

merchant_id.label: Merchant ID
merchant_id.comment: A static numeric merchant ID constant provided to you by Commission Junction. Merchant site pays a percentage of the sale when the affiliate sends them a customer who purchases something.

merchant_type.label: Merchant TYPE
merchant_type.comment: A static numeric merchant TYPE constant provided to you by Commission Junction.

container_id.label: Container Tag ID
container_id.comment: A static numeric provided to you by Commission Junction.

export_processtype.label: Export PROCESSTYPE
export_processtype.comment: Your data file must indicate either OVERWRITE or UPDATE

active.label: prevent B2B Customers from editing data

account_page_link.label: Customer Account Page Linkage
account_page_link.comment: Defining the link between pages and navigation items, so items can be highlighted.

account_page_banner.label: Customer Account Page Banner
account_page_banner.comment: Display banner for the following full action names:

professional_signup_url_key.label: Professional Sign Up Page URL Key

professional_signup_anchor_tag.label: Professional Sign Up Anchor Tag Value

disable_limit.label: Qty Threshold
disable_limit.comment: Qty which trigers the check for New version SKU

fields.require_name_registration: Show Name on Registration "No" will remove First and Last name from customer registration page.> select adminhtml/system_config_source_yesno 10 1 1 0

brand_name.label: Brand Name
brand_name.comment: Brand name to be displayed in customer registration success message

hide_forgot_password_text.label: Hide Forgot Password Text on Forgot Password Page

group_listing.label: Group Listing Page
group_listing.comment: Display Category Groups in Certain Category Listing Page

listing_display_product_once.label: Display Same Product Once In Listing Page
listing_display_product_once.comment: If a product belongs to multiple category groups, it will only be displayed once in the same listing page.

items.label: Product List Page Sorting Options
items.comment: Code values: name, price, created_at, position. Direction values: asc, desc

category_product_subtext.label: Display Product Subtext in Listing Page

subtext_attribute_id.label: Subtext Attribute Id
subtext_attribute_id.comment: Please do not change this field

display_cms_content_group_page.label: Display CMS Contents on Group Product Detail Page

show_default_tier_message.label: Product Tier Price Message
show_default_tier_message.comment: Display the default tier price message on prodcut detail page

cos_usage_values.label: CosMedix Usage Values
cos_usage_values.comment: Comma separated value of the usage option values in the following order: am,pm,allday. Default: 88,89,90

category_product_usage.label: CosMedix Usage Attribute Id
category_product_usage.comment: Please do not change this field. Default attribute id value: 221

brand_id.label: Brand ID
brand_id.comment: Used to submit forms into certain brands

cms_redirect.label: Professional Form Redirect Url Key
cms_redirect.comment: Url key of the professional sign up page

cart_balance_lookup_form.label: Gift Card on Shopping Cart Page

enable.label: Show Gift Card Balance Lookup Form

use_for_po_boxes_only.label: Use for PO and APO Boxes ONLY

hide_for_po_boxes_only.label: Hide for PO and APO Boxes
